oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service opening with Billy Summerford asking for prayer requests. Virgil Porter urges people to obey God. Members of the congregation pray at the altar before music begins and members of the church sing. Virgil Porter is first to lead the congregation in song and Margaret Baker follows after. Virgil Porter and a visiting preacher testify and are followed by Billy Summerford who preaches and lays hands on a member of the congregation. Music fills the church again and members sing, keep rhythm and dance in place during the singing, the camera faces the shoe of the cameraman. It is eventually lifted to show Carl Porter singing. Following his song, Several members testify and preach including Virgil Porter, Billy Summerford, and Junior McCormick. Billy Summerford’s sermon ends the video.
